doc:
"Mary Anderson (actress born 1918)" 0 Mary Bebe Anderson (April 3, 1918 – April 6, 2014) was an American actress, who appeared in 31 films and 22 television productions between 1939 and 1965. She was best known for her small supporting role in the film Gone With the Wind as well as one of the main characters in Alfred Hitchcock's 1943 film Lifeboat. Mary_Bebe_Anderson ( April_3_,_1918 – April_6_,_2014 ) was an_American_actress , who appeared in 31_films and 22_television_productions between 1939_and_1965 . She was_best_known for her_small_supporting_role in the_film Gone With the_Wind as_well as one of the_main_characters in Alfred_Hitchcock 's 1943_film Lifeboat .
